entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Souris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 03:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %

Dewpoint: -6.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 12:59 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing drizzle. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 12:59 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 12:59 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
